DOC.criteria: History symptomatic persistent longstanding persistent atrial fibrillation Failure least one antiarrhythmic drug Structural heart disease Prior ablation leave atrium AF Known sensitivity ( allergy ) heparin , warfarin , contrast medium Contraindicated MRI Invasive cardiovascular procedure perform plan within 3 month period ablation procedure
